price: Eğer sana hile yapmak isterlerse, şunu bil ki, Allah sana kâfidir. O, seni yardımıyla ve müminlerle destekleyendir.
arabic: وَإِن يُرِيدُوٓاْ أَن يَخۡدَعُوكَ فَإِنَّ حَسۡبَكَ ٱللَّهُۚ هُوَ ٱلَّذِيٓ أَيَّدَكَ بِنَصۡرِهِۦ وَبِٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Turkish Translation - Ali Ozek
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by a group of scholars. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-in yurīdū an yakhdaʿūka fa-inna ḥasbaka al-lahu huwa alladhī ayyadaka binaṣrihi wabil-mu'minīna
